xuiSlidable
directive in module xui

Description

XUI component for sliding elements with constraints based on mouse events. The boundary is automatically the parent element. The slided element and its parent element must have relative or absolute position.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY xui-slidable
     [on-drag="{Function(JQueryMouseEventObject): IDraggingPosition }"]
     [on-drag-start="{Function(JQueryMouseEventObject) }"]
     [on-drag-stop="{Function(JQueryMouseEventObject) }"]
     [on-drag-cancel="{Function(JQueryKeyEventObject) }"]
     [on-resized="{Function(JQueryEventObject) }"]
     is-drag-disabled="{boolean = false}"
     horizontal-step="{number = null}"
     vertical-step="{number = null}"
     vertical-step-shift="{number = null}"
     horizontal-step-shift="{number = null}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
on-drag
(optional)
Function(JQueryMouseEventObject): IDraggingPosition

Callback what is triggered when the target is being dragged. If it returns the positions, the handler will use them, so this is a way to explicitly manage the behavior of the dragged target.

on-drag-start
(optional)
Function(JQueryMouseEventObject)

Callback that is triggered when target is starting to be dragged.

on-drag-stop
(optional)
Function(JQueryMouseEventObject)

Callback that is triggered when target is no longer being dragged.

on-drag-cancel
(optional)
Function(JQueryKeyEventObject)

Callback that is triggered when drag is canceled by pressing ESC key.

on-resized
(optional)
Function(JQueryEventObject)

Callback that is triggered when the slidable container has been resized.

is-drag-disabledboolean = false

The disable state of the slidability.

horizontal-stepnumber = null

The slider will be enforced only the n * step pixel X values where n is integer and >= 0; If the value is not defined or not bigger than 0, it will be ignored.

vertical-stepnumber = null

The slider will be enforced only the n * step pixel Y values where n is integer and >= 0; If the value is not defined or not bigger than 0, it will be ignored.

vertical-step-shiftnumber = null

A value which shifts the starting points of the vertical steps. If negative or no value is given, it will be ignored.

horizontal-step-shiftnumber = null

A value which shifts the starting points of the horizontal steps. If negative or no value is given, it will be ignored.

Example
